癨字的基本解释

癨
huò
霍乱。

癨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huò］
［《廣韻》虚郭切，入鐸，曉。］
病名，霍乱。

癨字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　癨； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页782第37
【廣韻】虛郭切【正韻】忽郭切，?音霍。【玉篇】癨，病也。【廣韻】吐病。【類篇】病亂也。【正字通】按方書作霍亂，皆濕熱寒氣，七情內傷，六氣外感所致。或轉筋腹痛，或煩悶脹滿，或中惡吐逆。各證不一。

癨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
癨字的起名意思

暂无。

癨
Basic explanation of words
癨
huò
cholera.
癨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huò]
["Guangyun" Xu Guoqi, enter the duo, Xiao. ]
The name of the disease, cholera.
癨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　癨; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 782 Page 37
[Guang Yun] Xu Guoqi [Zheng Yun] Suddenly Guo Qi,? Yinhuo. 【Jade articles】Yi, disease also. [Guang Yun] Vomiting. 【Classes】Illnesses too. 【Zhengzitong】According to the prescription for cholera, all are caused by dampness, heat and cold, internal injuries of seven emotions, and external feelings of six qi. Or turn muscles and abdominal pain, or fullness of boredom, or nausea and vomiting. Each certificate is different.
